info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:58AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN HAMILTON...NORTHWESTERN FULTON AND SOUTHEASTERN HERKIMER COUNTIES... At 655 AM EDT, an area of moderate to heavy rain showers was located near Little Falls, moving northeast at 35 mph. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Mohawk, Dolgeville, Stratford, Middleville, Fairfield, Ingham Mills, Curtis, Countryman, North Ilion, Lotville, Rasbach Corner, Knappville, Burrell Corners, South Ilion, Kelhi Corners, Shedd Corners and Phipps Corners. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 29A and 30. Rainfall rates from the showers will be about a half an inch an hour at times. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized ponding of water and poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
